data.description: Irth is a captivating show that celebrates the rich heritage and deep history of Jordan. Hosted by Haya Al-Dajeh, it takes viewers on a vibrant journey through Jordanian culture, exploring timeless traditions, fascinating customs, and stories from the past. With each episode, Irth breathes life into Jordan's heritage, blending knowledge with entertainment, and offering a fresh perspective on the deep roots that connect us to our land. It's more than just a show—it's a celebration of identity, history, and the heart of Jordan
